Category: Serums & Essences
book: 2878-Avon Organist Rosemary Mint Hair Strengthening Oil

chunk: Ingredients: GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL, MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPERMINT) OIL, MENTHOL, PELARGONIUM GRAVEOLENS FLOWER OIL, MENTHA ARVENSIS LEAF OIL, JUNIPERUS MEXICANA OIL, BIOTIN, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, CITRAL.
book: 2878-Avon Organist Rosemary Mint Hair Strengthening Oil

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
